tool_description: Plans optimal plumbing routes for water supply and drainage, considering fixture locations, pipe runs, and access requirements for maintenance.

main_stack_location.description: Location of main plumbing stack: north-wall, south-wall, east-wall, west-wall, or center

toilet_position.description: Toilet center position [x, y] in feet from room corner

vanity_position.description: Vanity center position [x, y] in feet from room corner

shower_position.description: Shower drain position [x, y] in feet from room corner

existing_plumbing.description: Whether to work with existing plumbing locations

pipe_material.description: Preferred pipe material: PVC, copper, or PEX

access_panel_preferred.description: Whether to include access panels for maintenance

error_messages: Invalid stack location: Use north-wall, south-wall, east-wall, west-wall, or center.
Invalid fixture positions: Coordinates must be positive numbers within reasonable room bounds.
Invalid pipe material: Use PVC, copper, or PEX.
Plumbing route conflict: Proposed routes create conflicts with structural elements or other utilities.
usage: Specify main stack location and fixture positions. Optionally set constraints for existing plumbing, pipe material, and access panels. The tool generates optimal plumbing routes.

supply_route_length.description: Total length of hot and cold water supply lines in feet

drain_route_length.description: Total length of drainage lines in feet

vent_requirements.description: Required vent connections for each fixture

complexity_rating.description: Installation complexity: simple, moderate, or complex
